metadata.name: " MELTDOWN "
metadata.description:
When all seems lost, and hope is gone,
And you're left feeling like you don't belong,
In the aftermath of a meltdown's destruction,
There is a beauty that defies all obstruction.

It's in the way the sun still rises,
And in the way the world surprises,
With new growth and life from the ashes,
A reminder that beauty always surpasses.

So let go of the pain and the fear,
And embrace the beauty that's waiting here,
For after the meltdown comes a new start,
And a chance to heal and mend your heart.

by DOBA, 2023

3473x4444
